Description: 2012 TOWNHOUSE LOCATED ON ARLINGTON LINE, NEAR ALL . This 4 level 6 rooms 3 bedrooms, 2,5 bath home has it all. The first floor features a mostly open concept living room - dinning room kitchen 1/2 bath. Spacious kitchen with granite counters and all modern appliances included. Second floor with two large bedrooms, and two tile bathrooms, and one of separate laundry hookups. Second laundry is in the lower level. Third Floor has a very large bedroom or could be used as a home office or family room. All 3 levels with gleaming hardwood floors. In lower level you will find large room for storage and laundry. Direct access to exterior. Gas heat. CENTRAL AIR. Double insulated walls for energy savings. LEAD FREE. Two car parking and nice yard. Short distance to all. Shopping, Restaurants, Wilson Farms, Minuteman bikeway, Lexington Center. parks and more,
